detail_desc: Knee-length dress in an airy plumeti weave with an opening and ties at the top, a small stand-up collar and a wide flounce around the neckline. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and wide flounce at the hem. Sewn-in jersey inner dress.

Backpack in a patterned weave with a two-way zip and handle at the top. Adjustable, lightly padded shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment with a padded, imitation leather pendant. Size approx. 13x25x32 cm.

Long-sleeved blouse in airy chiffon with an embroidered pattern, small frilled collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and seam with a wide flounce at the hem and cuffs. Unlined.

Long-sleeved blouse in airy chiffon with an embroidered pattern, small frilled collar, V-neck and buttons down the front. Flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and seam with a wide flounce at the hem and cuffs. Unlined.

Backpack in nylon with a roll-top opening with an adjustable tab and plastic fastener. Handle at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a padded back plate in mesh. Lined. Size 14x27x46 cm.

Sandals in lace and imitation suede with an adjustable ankle strap and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Slingbacks in imitation suede with cut-out sections, pointed toes and an elasticated strap around the heel. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 7.5 cm.

Padded down jacket in woven fabric with an appliqué on one sleeve. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim and concealed hook and loop fastening. Zip down the front and welt side pockets. Fleece lining. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers.
Base layer tights in a soft wool blend with an elasticated waist.
Elasticated scrunchies in soft cotton jersey.

Jacquard-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Checked tights with an elasticated waist.
Jumper knitted in soft wool in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tights in a textured knit with an elasticated waist.

Boots in imitation leather with adjustable straps at the front with metal buckles, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3.5 cm.
Textured-knit tights designed to look like a pair of over-the-knee socks, with an elasticated waist.

Straight-cut blouse in airy, crinkled cotton with embroidered details. Small frilled collar with ties and an opening at the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with flounced, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Patterned tights containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. 30 denier.
Short, sleeveless playsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, button placket and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Smocking at the back, seam at the waist and a frill trim at the top and hems. Lined.
Short, sleeveless playsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, button placket and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Smocking at the back, seam at the waist and a frill trim at the top and hems. Lined.
Thin tights with shimmering metallic spots and an elasticated waist.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, chest pockets and side pockets with a flap. Detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
V-neck bustier in woven fabric with narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, a front fastening and inset, hole-embroidered trims at the hem. Lined.
V-neck bustier in woven fabric with narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, a front fastening and inset, hole-embroidered trims at the hem. Lined.

Maxi dress in an airy cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, a double-layered bodice at the front and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam under the bust, wide ties at the back, a wide skirt and a large flounce at the hem.

Maxi dress in an airy cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, a double-layered bodice at the front and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam under the bust, wide ties at the back, a wide skirt and a large flounce at the hem.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with elastication and a flounce at the top with a small opening and ties. Short, elasticated sleeves with a frill trim, and elastication and a flounce at the hem.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with elastication and a flounce at the top with a small opening and ties. Short, elasticated sleeves with a frill trim, and elastication and a flounce at the hem.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with elastication and a flounce at the top with a small opening and ties. Short, elasticated sleeves with a frill trim, and elastication and a flounce at the hem.

Tunic woven in an airy viscose blend with hole embroidery and inset lace sections. Frill-trimmed stand-up collar, a button placket and pin-tucks at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with pin-tucks and narrow cuffs, and a seam at the waist with tiers to the hem. Slightly longer underdress.

Short fancy dress costume in lace with a V-neck, lined cups with a silicone trim at the top and bodice with support panels and a zip at the back. Lined skirt and underskirt in a double layer of tulle.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and frill-trimmed chest pocket.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and frill-trimmed chest pocket.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and frill-trimmed chest pocket.
Blouse woven in an airy cotton blend with broderie anglaise, a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves with elasticated frill trims, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
